Title: Thymic IL-7 signaling goes beyond survival
Abstract: © 2015 Nature America, Inc. All rights reserved.Interleukin 7 (IL-7) promotes the self-renewing ability of CD4<sup>-</sup>CD8<sup>-</sup>double-negative thymocytes by both supporting cell growth and repressing rearrangements of the locus encoding the T cell antigen receptor (TCR).
